input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a wearable air conditioner with ion purifier that fits all seasons.

Tone: informative, comical

Audience: all
sentences: QOOLA is the perfect wearable air conditioner for all seasons! This innovative device fits comfortably around your neck and features an ion purifier to keep you cool and refreshed all day long. With QOOLA, you'll stay comfortable and healthy no matter what the weather is like outside!

Looking for a wearable air conditioner that fits all seasons? Look no further than QOOLA! Our air conditioner not only keeps you cool, but it also features an ion purifier to help keep your environment healthy.

QOOLA is the wearable air conditioner that keeps you feeling cool and comfortable all season long! No more worrying about being too hot or too cold, QOOLA has you covered! Plus, the built-in ion purifier helps to keep your air clean and fresh.

input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a wearable air conditioner with ion purifier that fits all seasons.

Tone: informative, comical

Audience: all
sentences: QOOLA is the perfect air conditioner for all seasons! It's a wearable air conditioner with an ion purifier, which means you'll stay cool and your air will be clean.

Are you tired of being hot and sweaty all the time? Well, have we got the perfect solution for you! QOOLA is a wearable air conditioner that fits all seasons. It's perfect for people who live in hot climates or for anyone who wants to feel cool and comfortable all day long. Plus, the ion purifier helps to clean the air and get rid of allergens, making it a great choice for people with asthma or allergies.

Summer is coming, and with it, the heat! Be prepared this year with QOOLA, the wearable air conditioner with ion purifier. No more excuses for being too hot! QOOLA fits all seasons, so you can stay cool all year long. Plus, it comes in a variety of colors, so you can show off your style even while you're cooling off.
